title: Left over Project Boxes
body:
Hello Dear League Community,

so after a Long time i checked my Loot Tab and found some left over Project Caches all 4 Blue-Green-Red and the Golden One....i dont rly know what to do with them.... i cant open or disenchand them or destroy them ....do i have to ask a Rioter to Remove them?? or is ther a way to destroy them by yourself

replies.body:
Looks like you've got a little souvenir from the Project Event! They were all supposed to have been removed after the event was finished, but it looks like your's just couldn't bear to be separated from you. 

If you want them removed, go ahead and hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and just confirm that you need those extra chests removed.
